<h3 id="X31803">X(31803) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC AND INNER-GARCIA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*((b+c)*a^5-(b^2+c^2)*a^4-(b+c)*(2*b^2-3*b*c+2*c^2)*a^3+(2*b^2-3*b*c+2*c^2)*(b+c)^2*a^2+(b^3+c^3)*(b-c)^2*a-(b+c)*(b^2-c^2)*(b^3-c^3))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31803) = 2*X(3)-3*X(10176) = 4*X(5)-3*X(5883) = 3*X(5)-2*X(5885) = 2*X(10)-3*X(15064) = 3*X(10)-2*X(31788) = X(20)-3*X(5692) = X(65)-3*X(5927) = 3*X(72)-X(7957) = 3*X(165)-5*X(3876) = 3*X(165)-X(9961) = 5*X(3876)-X(9961) = 4*X(5777)-3*X(15064) = 3*X(5777)-X(31788) = 3*X(5883)-2*X(5884) = 9*X(5883)-8*X(5885) = 3*X(5884)-4*X(5885) = 3*X(5927)-2*X(19925) = X(7957)+3*X(12688) = 3*X(10176)-4*X(20117) = 9*X(15064)-4*X(31788) = X(31806)+2*X(31828)</b>
<p>X(31803) lies on these lines:

<p>
X(31803) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 12528}, {4, 5693}, {72, 12688}, {84, 12666}, {962, 5904}, {3869, 5691}, {5694, 31828}, {12672, 14872}, {17638, 17661}<br>
X(31803) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3, 20117), (10, 5777), (40, 3678), (65, 19925), (944, 3884), (960, 31821), (3579, 31835), (3874, 946), (3878, 5887), (4084, 7686), (4297, 960), (4301, 9856), (5836, 9947), (5884, 5), (9943, 5044), (24474, 18483), (24475, 9955), (31730, 31837), (31798, 4662), (31806, 5694)<br>
X(31803) = complement of X(15071)<br>
X(31803) = X(1)-of-X(4)-Brocard-triangle<br>
X(31803) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (3, 20117, 10176), (5, 5884, 5883)<br>
</p>
